text: How do I diagnose a slow GPU solve ? It's currently very slow but GPU usage is also very low. I'd expect the GPU usage to at least be high. CPU usage is also surprisingly high, while I would expect nothing to happen on the CPU. :/

elements.text: How do I diagnose a slow GPU solve ? It's currently very slow but GPU usage is also very low. I'd expect the GPU usage to at least be high. CPU usage is also surprisingly high, while I would expect nothing to happen on the CPU. :/

text: the usual thing is like scalar indexing, but that throws a warning

elements.text: the usual thing is like scalar indexing, but that throws a warning

text:
I've disabled scalar indexing though

CUDA.allowscalar(false)

But yes that would have been my guess.

My two current guesses are:

1. a type instability cause my gradients to be recompiled every time
2. I just suck at programming
